title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 39.3 - Reports of contractors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 39.3 - Reports of contractors

State Regulations

All contractors shall submit a report, in narrative or other
appropriate form, as supplementing materials to their bids, documenting
evidence of their efforts to encourage the participation of New York suppliers
and subcontractors on accelerated capacity and transportation improvements and
municipal bridge improvements financed pursuant to article 20 of the

Transportation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
39.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
